item.title: Production Dashboard Development - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced .NET developer to create a production dashboard within our existing ERP, which is developed in ASP.NET Core MVC with Razor Pages. The dashboard's stored procedure has already been written in-house. The developer should be able to create charts and stats based on permissions. More details will be provided to the selected developer. There are long-term opportunities for further enhancements. Prefer to Freelancer Deliver by Monday 17th 2024

Budget: $50

item.title: Tableau Dashboard Builder - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a skilled Tableau expert to build dynamic dashboards using web data. The ideal candidate must create API required and find solution to make the dash fast enough for analytics. Strong Tableau, API and data managed skills required.

Responsibilities:
- create API to consume relevant data from web
- manage availability of data (some data are required on a daily basis, historical will be consult ad hoc)
- Create interactive visualizations for data exploration

Requirements:
- Proven experience in building Tableau dashboards
- Strong knowledge in data base management and visualisation
- Proficient in SQL and data manipulation
- Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

If you're passionate about data and finding solutions for visualisation we'd love to hear from you. This is an opportunity to contribute to our data-driven decision-making process and create a cool investment management tool.

Hourly Range: $22.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 07:13 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Tableau, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, API
Skills: Tableau, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, API
Country: Thailand

item.title: Power Query Developers Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking 4 Power Query developers to join our team for a 2-month project. As a Power Query developer, you will be responsible for designing and developing efficient data transformation processes using the Power Query language. Your main tasks will include extracting data from various sources, cleaning and transforming data, and loading it into the desired format. The ideal candidates should have a strong background in data analysis and experience with Power Query and Excel. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail are crucial. If you are a self-motivated individual with a passion for data manipulation, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Power Query
- Data Analysis
- Microsoft Excel

Please include examples of your previous Power Query projects in your application.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$42.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 01:17 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:SQL, JavaScript, MySQL, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft SQL Server

item.title: Portfolio Performance Unit - Data Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
The Portfolio Performance Unit (PPU) is at the heart of CGIAR’s new Performance and Results Management System (PRMS), which supports the annual reporting and planning of 32 large Initiatives (research programs) across the globe. The PRMS offers a very rich dataset of the 100s of CGIAR results that are being developed globally, which is expected to be used for strategic decision-making at Initiative/ Program, country, and thematic area levels.

We are looking for 2 dynamic and agile people to join our team on a short-term, part-time contract with the potential for longer-term engagement based on performance. This is an excellent opportunity to work on exciting projects where rapid prototyping and insightful data analysis are at the core.

The main work will consist of a mix of standard business intelligence visualizations such as bar charts, Sankey, scatterplots and others. Internal stakeholders may occasionally contact us with questions we need to answer in a timely manner through the data in various creative ways.

Specific tasks include:
- Generate internal data reports (PowerPoint, Excel, Word, and others) and dashboards that are critical for decision-making processes.
- Work with multiple data sets. Solve difficult, non-routine analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods as needed. Stakeholders will reach out ad hoc with questions, and together, we need to determine if we have the data collected to answer them and, if so, how we could do it. It will be a mix of various levels of effort and collaborations with SMEs.
- Create compelling data visualizations to communicate findings to the team and other stakeholders effectively.
- Engage in rapid prototyping of solutions to business challenges, demonstrating agility and a fail-fast, learn-fast attitude.
- Continuously learn and adapt to new technologies that can enhance data analysis and insights extraction.

Requirements:
- Evidence of relevant experience in data analysis and visualization (in any role).
- Excellent communication skills, able to interact with a multi-cultural and interdisciplinary team of experts and developers in layman language.
- Proactive and independent problem solver, an excellent team player.
- An agile and resourceful mindset, with a passion for solving business challenges through data.
- Willingness to continuously learn new tools and techniques.
- Experience in at least 1 of the following 2 software:
- Microsoft PowerBI
- Tableau

Nice to have:
- Experience with MS Fabric (Pipeline, dataflow, Lakehouse, data factory)


Posted On: June 14, 2024 22:42 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Statistics
Skills: Statistics
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Microstrategy Training and Data Import Help - Upwork
item.description:
Joshua,

I own a small business and would love to see if Microstrategy will be helpful in data analysis.

After playing around with the demo I can clearly see that my time will be much better spent working with someone who is familiar with Microstrategy.

Our data analysis needs are not complex, but as the business owner I know I don't have time to learn the ins and outs of how to import my data (it is all just in a spreadsheet currently).

I don't image this entire project would take more than 3-4 hours.

Let me know if you have any questions - thanks!

item.title: Power BI Finance and Operations Dashboard Development  - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a partner to manage the development of custom Power BI dashboards. These dashboards will support reporting at a middle market financial services firm with a focus on finance, accounting, operations and sales pipeline performance.

The initial project will entail a suite of 2-4 dashboards that report on sales pipeline metrics.

The right partner for this job will:
1. Have a proven track record of successful Power BI dashboard development.

2. Be able to interpret business requirements from a written spec and legacy Word of PDF sample reports and create a dynamic, modern, visually engaging, interactive Power BI dashboard.

3. Be responsive and provide continuous updates on progress.

4. Ask questions to ensure that all requirements are understood.

5. Have experience developing dashboards based on Excel data files as well as data warehouse solutions such as Snowflake.

6. Provide references who can speak to their experience with the partner and share lessons learned.

When responding to this post please provide details about past projects and visual examples of Power BI dashboards that align with the description of this project.

Success on the initial project may lead to subsequent engagements and continued work on additional Power BI initiatives.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 18:37 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence, Data Visualization
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence, Data Visualization
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: PowerBI: Create Comparative Performance Visualization based on variable start date - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who can help me create a comparative performance visualization of two financial funds.

The goal is to normalize the values of both funds so they start at the same point on a selected start date, allowing for a clear comparison of their relative performance from that date onward.

I have the closing prices of each fund on each date.

1st column: Date
2nd Column: Closing price Fund A
3rd Column: Closing Price Fund B


I want to have a visual where I select the start date for comparison. It gives a percentage performance comparing the two funds. This means that they will start at the same point (0%) and see the relative performance. Additionally, if possible I would like to create an bar graph overlapping this graph showing the outperformance or underperformance of Fund A relative to Fund B.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 14, 2024 13:45 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Expert| Business Intelligence Analyst Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an analyst on a part-time or full-time basis who can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset (any time zone is fine)

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks. Time tracking is required.

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced business analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create report from SQL DB (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, Snowflake)
-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
-Formatting (visually appealing)
-Data modeling (different cardinalities)
-Use DAX to create dynamic models
-Asking questions, figuring out answers to problems by being proactive



NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER who JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone who can provide solutions and ASK QUESTIONS.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-
-Work closely with me to make value-added analytical services available to stakeholders
-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

Must have:
PowerBI
SQL




Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:07 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Salesforce, Finance, Tableau, R, Microsoft PowerApps
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Salesforce, Finance, Tableau, R, Microsoft PowerApps
Country: United States
click to apply
item.content:encoded:
I am looking for an analyst on a part-time or full-time basis who can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset (any time zone is fine)

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks. Time tracking is required.

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced business analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create report from SQL DB (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, Snowflake)
-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
-Formatting (visually appealing)
-Data modeling (different cardinalities)
-Use DAX to create dynamic models
-Asking questions, figuring out answers to problems by being proactive



NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER who JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone who can provide solutions and ASK QUESTIONS.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-
-Work closely with me to make value-added analytical services available to stakeholders
-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

Must have:
PowerBI
SQL




Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Data Visualisation Tool for Merchandising (similar to Pivot Viewer) - Upwork
item.description:
I used a tool called Pivot Viewer from microsoft silverlight, which was discontinued a few years back.
I am looking for someone who can help me create a similar tool, helping me to visualise product data on two different dimensions.
The data is provided in excel with every row being one specific product and each column consisting of different metrics/attributes, e.g. sales, margin, colour, sell-through rate.
The tool should render the images (also provided via a link to shoplift in the excel file) and illustrate the full assortment depending on the selection of metrics, e.g. Sales on x-axis and STR on y-axis.

He is a video describing the capabilities of PivotViewer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Aey3xm0CBg

Hourly Range: $32.00-$60.00

item.title: CRO | UX | Digital experience Optimization Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
CRO & UX Optimization Specialist

About Us:
We specialize in Digital Experience Optimization, collaborating with e-commerce brands in fashion and betting. Our goal is to enhance website and app performance through UX and conversion optimization.

Job Overview:
We are seeking a CRO & UX Optimization Specialist to identify and resolve conversion bottlenecks using tools like Contentsquare, Hotjar, and Google Analytics. We can also adopt real user monitoring or sythethic monitoring tools.

Responsibilities:

Conduct CRO analyses to improve conversion rates.
Create reports and dashboards visually appealing using Looker or PowerBI.
Optional: Apply real user and synthetic monitoring to ensure performance.
Requirements:

Experience in CRO and UX optimization, preferably in e-commerce for fashion and betting.
Proficiency with Contentsquare, Hotjar, Google Analytics, Looker, or PowerBI.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Effective communication skills.

If you are passionate about CRO and UX optimization with a good technical background, apply now. This position starts with an ad hoc analysis and may develop into a long-term role if successful.

item.title: Data Analysis Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Data Analysis Specialist to join our team. As a Data Analysis Specialist, you will be responsible for analyzing large datasets to identify patterns, trends, and insights that will drive business decisions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement data analysis strategies, develop statistical models, and create data visualizations. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in data analysis, statistical analysis, and data visualization tools. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail are a must.

Skills required:

- Strong analytical and critical thinking skills
- Proficiency in data analysis techniques
- Experience with statistical analysis software (e.g., R, Python)
- Knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
- Strong communication and presentation skills
- Attention to detail and accuracy

item.description:
Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and implement custom business applications using Microsoft PowerApps.
Automate workflows and business processes using PowerAutomate.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Customize and extend existing applications and workflows to meet business needs.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to PowerApps and PowerAutomate solutions.
Provide training and support to end-users and team members on PowerApps and PowerAutomate functionalities.
Stay updated with the latest features and best practices in Power Platform and share knowledge with the team.
Ensure solutions are scalable, maintainable, and meet security standards.

Proven experience in designing and developing applications using Microsoft PowerApps.

Experience with SharePoint, Microsoft 365, and related technologies.
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently in a remote setting.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
Preferred Qualifications:
Microsoft Power Platform certifications.
Experience with Azure services and integrations.
Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management tools.
Previous experience in a remote work environment.

Location: Remote

item.title: Looking for Data scientists- to work in secure time and activity monitored environment - Upwork
item.description:
Redoing this post because of change in instruction from client .
Urgent : We are a leading analytics workflow for a client , and are  looking to outsource a comprehensive data science and engineering project. We seek professionals with significant experience in data science and engineering, proficient in popular tools and technologies, and with a strong background in maintaining client confidentiality.

Responsibilities:
Data Collection and Processing: Design and implement data pipelines for collecting, cleaning, and processing large datasets.
Analysis and Modeling: Perform statistical analysis, build predictive models, and provide actionable insights using tools like Python, R, SQL, and MATLAB.
Machine Learning: Develop and deploy machine learning algorithms and models using libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
Data Visualization: Create compelling visualizations using tools like Tableau, Power BI, and D3.js to present findings to stakeholders.
Database Management: Design, implement, and maintain databases using technologies like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Cloud Services: Utilize cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure for data storage, processing, and deployment.
Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams and external clients to understand their requirements and deliver data-driven solutions.
Requirements:
Experience: Proven experience working with clients who have stringent confidentiality requirements regarding data and other sensitive aspects.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in data science and engineering tools and technologies as mentioned above.
Industry Knowledge: Experience in multiple industries.
Problem Solving: Demonstrated ability to handle complex data problems and provide innovative solutions.
Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Application Process:
Experience and Industry Exposure:
List the industries you have worked for.
Confidentiality Situations:
Describe three client situations where you had to maintain confidentiality.
Detail the situation and the actions you took to ensure confidentiality.
Interview: Shortlisted candidates will be invited for a 15-minute interview.
Duration:
This is a 2.5 to 3-month contract position.

Application Instructions:
As part of the application process, please ensure that you include the following specific requirement in your description of confidentiality situations:
How to Apply:
Mention your understanding of  "deep learning principles" in your application
How to Apply: Application Instructions:please answer the 4 questions below
Please give us the categories you have worked in deep learning
Have you worked in a secure time and activity tracked environment before ?
On a scale of 1 to 10, please indicate how comfortable you are being time and activity tracked, with 10 being very comfortable and 1 being not at all comfortable.
Is there anything you are uncomfortable with in this description?


Hourly Range: $35.00-$38.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 08:33 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Customer Service Analytics, Human Resources Analytics, Growth Analytics, Operations Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Sales Analytics, Product Analytics, Analytical Presentation, Exploratory Data Analysis, Data Science
Skills: Customer Service Analytics, Human Resources Analytics, Growth Analytics, Operations Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Sales Analytics, Product Analytics, Analytical Presentation, Exploratory Data Analysis, Data Science
Country: United Arab Emirates

item.title: Integration of Tally and excel. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi Hemant,

We are a small construction company and currently use Tally Prime as our primary accounting software. However, our senior management team is not very proficient in operating Tally. Therefore, we need a system that integrates Tally Prime with MS Excel in predefined formats.

The management needs to view real-time data, such as bank balances, receivables, payables, inventory, and more, directly in Excel. We do not want the accounts team to manually upload data frequently; instead, we aim for a one-time connection that provides live, up-to-date reports whenever needed.

Given your expertise, I believe you can handle this task with ease. Could you please let me know how long this would take and if you need any further information?

Thanks & Regards,
Vikas

Category: Business Applications Development
Skills:PHP, Visual Basic, Microsoft VBScript, Tally.ERP, Application Lifecycle Management, API Development, Desktop Application, Microsoft Excel, .NET Core, Microsoft Power BI, Android App

item.title: Need help setting up Teams for my business - Upwork
item.description:
I have a small B2B company providing litigation support to law firms. The assignments from clients come in via email and I would like to start using Teams to  
1.  Communicate with my 3+ subcontractors.
2. Manage the assignment emails (turn email into an assignment) in Teams
3. Be able to see all assignments and their status
4.  Organize email assignments
4.  Use SharePoint to file documents
I have looked at various project management platforms and Teams seems best-suited to my needs, especially because I already have it!  I can receive up to 50 emails per day and each of those assignments might have multiple steps so I need a tool to track lots of projects and their stages. What I would like from you:

1. Assessment of my needs to find solutions
2.  Set up of Teams given my specific needs
3. Integration of MS 365 apps with Teams (duh)
4. Ability to grow as company grows
5. Training on Teams and ongoing support.

I have experience with Teams but need help with the above.  I am hoping to get this started in the next week with a finish time of say a month?  Thanks!
Molly Z.


Posted On: June 13, 2024 22:11 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:C#, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft SharePoint, Office 365, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft SharePoint Administration, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Office SharePoint Server

Requirements: Strong proficiency in excel / PowerPoint, background in design, existing portfolio of created PowerPoint presentations.

item.title: Power BI Expert for API Integration and Financial Reporting - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI expert to help us connect an API from our Commercial Real Estate management software to Power BI. The goal is to create comprehensive and dynamic financial reports that integrate seamlessly with our existing systems. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Power BI and experience working with APIs. They should also possess extensive knowledge of financial reporting and be able to design visually appealing dashboards and visualizations. This role requires excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently. If you have a passion for data analysis and the expertise to deliver high-quality financial reports, we would love to hear from you.

Relevant skills:

- Power BI
- API integration
- Commercial Real Estate management software
- Financial reporting

item.title: Advanced ER Data Model Consultation - Upwork
item.description:
Hi everyone.

For a powerBI dashboard we are currently trying to come up with a new data model design. In the starting point, the data had the wrong hierarchy and also did not aggregate the data correctly with time trackings.

We have the following tables:
- PP-Issue (JIRA): hierarchy level 1
- Epic (JIRA): hierarchy level  2
- Issue (JIRA): hierarchy level  3
- Subissue (JIRA): hierarchy level  4
- TimeTracking Table. should be joined

Currently, the correct Hierarchy from PP-Issue to Epic to Issue to subissue is established, but the time trackings are not assigned correctly.

I would need a direct consultation session (1-3 hours) to solve this problem. Therefore an advanced data modelling expert is needed to quickly grasp the problem and find a solution together.  The consultation should take place in the next 3 days.

Issues to Address:
The initial data hierarchy was incorrect.
Data aggregation, especially with time tracking, was flawed.
Although we have established the correct hierarchy from PP-Issue to Epic to Issue to Subissue, the time tracking data is still not assigned correctly.

Requirements:
Advanced expertise in data modeling, particularly with Power BI.
Experience with JIRA data structures is a plus.
Availability for a consultation session within the next 3 days.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 13, 2024 17:26 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Entity Relationship Diagram, Database Architecture
Skills: Entity Relationship Diagram, Database Architecture
Country: Austria
click to apply
